description: Array T read by diagonals: T(h,k)=number of paths consisting of steps from (0,0) to (h,k) such that each step has length 1 directed up or right and no step touches the line y=x/3 unless x=0 or x=h.
links: M. Janjic and B. Petkovic, A Counting Function, arXiv preprint arXiv:1301.4550, 2013. - From N. J. A. Sloane, Feb 13 2013
author: _Clark Kimberling_
